statement: Human activities are the primary cause of current climate change through greenhouse gas emissions
sources: Myers et al. 2021 (Environ. Res. Lett.); Pew Research Center 2023

statement: COVID-19 vaccines are safe and effective at preventing severe disease and death
sources: CDC ACIP recommendations 2023; Kaiser Family Foundation 2023

statement: Humans and other species evolved through natural selection over millions of years
Genetically modified foods currently available are safe to eat
Modern nuclear power is a safe, low-carbon energy source when properly regulated
Water fluoridation at recommended levels is safe and prevents tooth decay
There is no causal link between vaccines and autism
sources: Institute of Medicine 2013; multiple meta-analyses; Pew 2023

statement: 5G wireless technology poses no known health risks at current exposure levels
sources: WHO EMF Project 2020; ICNIRP Guidelines 2020; Pew 2023

issue: Effectiveness of Masks for Disease Prevention
statement: Masks effectively reduce transmission of respiratory diseases when properly worn
Earth is approximately 4.54 billion years old based on radiometric dating
